problem_statement: Create a Playwright test suite for a draggable Kanban board application that covers all user workflows task CRUD, drag-and-drop, inline editing, modal interactions, and localStorage persistence using both isolated component tests via page.evaluate() and full end-to-end simulations. Implement meta-tests to validate the test suiteâ€™s quality, ensuring every test has meaningful assertions, handles edge cases, and would fail if the underlying implementation broke, while verifying proper Playwright structure, async usage, and browser context isolation. The meta-test suite must run independently and produce a health report on test integrity and coverage.
